ComicInfo.Title: For a Few Fists More
ComicInfo.Summary: For a Few Fists More: A man who is aging backwards, tries to force Iron Fist and Spider-Man to fight, so he can absorb their energies and slow down the de-aging process. When they defeat him, it speeds up the de-aging process and Drom fades away.
